Player History
Was selected to the 1966 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 7/16/1966...
Injured on 6/14/1967 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1968 Allstar game...
Traded from Minnesota to St. Louis on 6/25/1969 (Going to STL: C E. Battey, SS T. Reynolds, 2B B. Allen, RF W. Horton. Going to MIN: 1B S. Garvey, 3B M. Rogodzinski)...
Was selected to the 1969 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/8/1969 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
Injured on 8/3/1969 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Traded from St. Louis to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1971 (Going to CHC: 3B T. Reynolds, P H. Fanok. Going to STL: C C. Taylor)...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles on 4/1/1971...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/5/1972 to a 4-year deal worth $12,300,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Cincinnati on 9/8/1972...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/23/1972, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Pittsburgh on 6/26/1973...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Atlanta on 6/14/1975...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/6/1976 to a 2-year deal worth $10,123,456 per year...
Had 2000th career hit on 4/8/1976, off Jesse Hickman (CLE)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Texas on 9/1/1976...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Cleveland on 5/14/1977...
